description:
The Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Digital Fury Cannon Weapon Pack* includes: 
-One digital Fury Cannon weapon
-One digital Imploder Mk.2 weapon

Fury Cannon scorches everything (including structures) with fiery explosive rockets. 

Imploder Mk.2 pulls groups of enemies into deadly vortexes that cause devastating damage.

This Weapon Pack is included in the Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Collection 2 Pack. Check it out for the best way to complete your fleet!*

*Starlink: Battle For Atlas game required to play.
name: Starlink: Battle for Atlas Digital Fury Cannon Weapon Pack
